questions.question: What is the dominant color of the portable work light's casing?

What material appears to constitute the majority of the lamp's construction?
What type of handle is integrated into the top of the lighting unit?
Considering the base, what is the primary method of support for the light?
What is the apparent color of the light's collapsible legs or stand?

What appears to be the primary function of the visible cord extending from the light?

Are any visible markings or branding elements present on the lamp itself?
Does the visible power cord appear to be sufficiently long for practical use?
